summary: Just a little program to shake up your Skyrim playing.
descriptionHtml:
Rules: 
0. Download ans install Skyrim Roulette. 
1. Endorse Skyrim Roulette
2. Hit the button.
3. Select the race it shows you.
4. The Follower field restricts your follower to only what it shows you.
5. The ENTIRE TIME YOU'RE PLAYING, you can only use the play style shown. 
6. When you die, quit playing that character and post in the Torvus Forum telling how far you got.
7. No reloads, unless you're going to stop playing for a while. You cannot save to reload in case you die. That's cheating. ;)
8. No God Mode.
author: Johnathan Bane for Cave Troll Computing
